I am a postdoctoral researcher at the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science at the Eindhoven University of Technology, working with Aida Abiad. I received my Ph.D. degree in 2021 from the Department of Mathematics at CINVESTAV under supervision of Carlos A. Alfaro and Carlos E. Valencia.
